CN.content:

Paragraph: In this study , three kinds of low band gap copolymers integrating DTP as the donor block and the most - used BT as the acceptor unit were synthesized.

1. DTP (donor block)
2. BT (acceptor unit)

These two entities can be considered as the "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph. DTP and BT are likely abbreviations for specific materials or chemical compounds used in the synthesis of the low band gap copolymers.

1. DTP
2. BT

These are the entities that clearly refer to Material Names in the given paragraph.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
